autoFocus.description:
If `true`, the first focusable element within the `children`
will auto-focused once `FocusLock` mounts
autoFocus.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则为 'children' 中的第一个可聚焦元素
将在 'FocusLock' 挂载后自动聚焦

contentRef.description: The `ref` of the wrapper for which the focus-lock wraps
contentRef.description_zh: 焦点锁包装的包装器的 'ref'

finalFocusRef.description:
`ref` of the element to return focus to when `FocusLock`
unmounts
finalFocusRef.description_zh:
当 'FocusLock' 时要将焦点返回到的元素的 'ref'
卸载

initialFocusRef.description: `ref` of the element to receive focus initially
initialFocusRef.description_zh: 最初接收焦点的元素的 'ref'

isDisabled.description: If `true`, focus trapping will be disabled
isDisabled.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则禁用焦点捕获

lockFocusAcrossFrames.description:
Enables aggressive focus capturing within iframes.
- If `true`: keep focus in the lock, no matter where lock is active
- If `false`:  allows focus to move outside of iframe
lockFocusAcrossFrames.description_zh:
在 iframe 中启用主动焦点捕获。
- 如果为 'true'：无论锁在哪里处于活动状态，都将焦点保持在锁中
- 如果为“false”：允许焦点移出 iframe

persistentFocus.description: If `true`, disables text selections inside, and outside focus lock
persistentFocus.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则禁用焦点锁定内部和外部的文本选择

restoreFocus.description:
If `true`, focus will be restored to the element that
triggered the `FocusLock` once it unmounts
restoreFocus.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则焦点将恢复到
卸载后触发 'FocusLock'
